vogar

Class Console.StreamingConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.Console
      • vogar.Console.StreamingConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Log
    Enclosing class:
    Console

    static class Console.StreamingConsole
extends Console
    This console prints output as it's emitted. It supports at most one action at a time.

      void action(java.lang.String name)

      • streamOutput

        public void streamOutput(java.lang.String outcomeName,
                java.lang.String output)
        Description copied from class: Console
        Appends the action output immediately to the stream when streaming is on, or to a buffer when streaming is off. Buffered output will be held and printed only if the outcome is unsuccessful.
        Specified by:
        streamOutput in class Console
